DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze effectiveness three manipulative therapy technique People Chronic Low Back Pain .
DOC.brief_title: Manipulative Therapy Techniques Treat Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To analyze effectiveness three manipulative therapy technique individual chronic non-specific low back pain mechanical etiology . Design : Randomized clinical trial . Setting : Almeria , South Spain . Participants : Sixty two chronic non-specific low back pain randomly assign experimental control group . Intervention : For 3-week , experimental group undergo treatment comprise 3 session ( 1/week ) manipulative therapy technique lumbar sacral area , control group receive functional technique lumbar area . Main Outcome Measures : Oswestry disability index , pain visual analogue scale , Tampa scale kinesiophobia , Roland-Morris disability questionnaire , McQuade test , quality life score range trunk anteflexion motion , assess treatment immediately last treatment session . The primary outcome measure change RMDQ score end 3 week study period . A difference 2.5 point consider minimum clinically important difference RMDQ score . A sample size 62 patient ( 31 per group ) would enable detection 2.5 point difference group give 80-90 % power , 5 % ( two-tailed ) significance level , conservative standard derivation 5 point . Key baseline demographic variable clinical measure score compare group use independent Student test continuous data chi-square test categorical data . Separate 2x2 mixed model ANOVA repeat measurement time factor need conduct order test between-groups difference visual analogue scale , McQuade test , range trunk anteflexion motion , Oswestry disability index , Roland Morris disability questionnaire , Tampa scale kinesiophobia , quality life dependent variable , group ( functional technique three manipulative therapy technique ) subject variable time ( baseline , post-treatment ) . A paired t-test perform test within-group difference score change pre- post-treatment . Effect size test use Cohen 's d. p = 0.05 consider significant test .
DOC.criteria: Low back pain ≥ 3 month . Score ≥4 Roland Morris disability questionnaire . No undergo another physical therapy treatment . Inability achieve lumbar muscle flexionrelaxation trunk flexion Clinical sign radiculopathy . Presence lumbar stenosis . Fibromyalgia . Spondylolisthesis . History spinal surgery . Treatment corticosteroid past two week . Disease central peripheral nervous system .
